title: Review Shimano Di2 GRX 2x | Race Metal Video Series with Miguel
content:
In this episode of Race Metal, Miguel talks us through why he ditched his 1x setup for Shimano’s 2x Di2 GRX groupset.

Please, if you enjoy these videos, hit the subscribe button below!
